response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $10,000. Considering its rarity and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at an exclusive price of $15,000. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's anything else I can assist you with. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 15000}
